Headline: Temporary #26 South Shore Express Reroute at 83rd/Commercial
ShortDescription: 26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted near 83rd/Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via  83rd, Exchange, 79th, South Shore, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 83rd/Commercial.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary # 71 71st/South Shore Reroute at 83rd/Commercial
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted near 83rd/Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via  83rd, Exchange, 79th, South Shore, and resume normal route, due to street blockage, near 83rd/Commercial.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Eastbound #87 87th Reroute near 87th/Baltimore
ShortDescription: Eastbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted near 87th/Baltimore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Houston, 91st, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 87th/Baltimore.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
